name: The small Frozen town with no name - micro setting for Frontier Scum
name_original: The small Frozen town with no name - micro setting for Frontier Scum
description:
A small village without a name that lived in better days. A place to personalize according to your desire, which has some premises for some adventures. A criminal family, an abandoned railroad, an angry widow. It's up to you to see what is useful for your game.

All described on a single page

The small frozen town with no name is an independent production by Coup Critique and is not affiliated with Den of Druids. It is published under the FRONTIER SCUM Third-Party License.

FRONTIER SCUM is copyright Den of Druids.

FRONTIER SCUM is a rules-lite Acid Western roleplaying game. An auto-destructive, violent and LSD-infused take on Spaghetti Westerns, about wanted outlaws making their mark on an unreal Lost Frontier. Probably getting shot before having the chance to shoot. A rough-and-tumble world of insatiable greed where scum live one slug from the grave. Inspired by such things as El Topo, Dead Man, and Bone Tomahawk. For more information : https://frontierscum.com/
